    • Method Detail

      • logger

        public static java.util.logging.Logger logger(java.lang.Class<?> c)
        buils a Logger for a given class.
        Parameters:
        c - class which the name for the logger will be taken from
        Returns:
        a Logger object with the setted Formatter and Handler.

      • buildHandler

        public static java.util.logging.Handler buildHandler()
        buils a Handler for Logger. If the ILoggingConstants.DEBUG is set to false, only the warning and error information is logged to console. If the ILoggingConstants.CENTRALIZED_LOG is set to true, a CentralizedLogHandler is instanced.
        Returns:
        a Handler for the configured medium (currently console).

      • buildFormatter

        public static java.util.logging.SimpleFormatter buildFormatter(java.lang.String className)
        buils a Formatter for the Logger
        Parameters:
        className - string containig the name of the class where the logger is instanced
        Returns:
        a SimpleFormatter object with the selected format.
